name: Near Death Experience (itch) (Shot out games)
description:
• 2.5D side scrolling platformer with a twist
  • The greater your damage the greater your power
  • Gain a mysterious powerful force that can only be obtained from this strange enemy
  • Shoot, punch and kick to slow the enemy down as they can not be destroyed
  • All the damage you do increases your health but lessens your powers
  • Balance your power with your health as you power jump through this bizarre empire looking for eight soul cubes
  • Find all the cubes to unlock the transparent exit
  • Enter the final room and destroy the leader to complete your experience
  • POWER TIP: Keep your health LOW to jump to HIGHER platforms
  • TWEAKS: Jump and Enemy AI
  • Tap JUMP for basic jump. Hold JUMP for high jump. Maximum jump height is determined by your power.
  • Gamepad Combatible
    • SHOOT: Space Bar (Left Trigger XBOX One)
    • PUNCH: Z Key (B Button)
    • KICK: X Key (Y Button)
